types:type.name: input_Csv_metaData
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type input_Csv_metaData = Array<{| id: Number, Name: String, Age: Number, Gender: String, DOB: Date, City: String|}> {"isQuotedString": "false", "header": "true", "headerLineNumber": "0"}

types:type.name: output_csv
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type output_csv = Array<{| std_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, name: String, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}, gender: String, dob: String, city: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"std_id\\\":100,\\\"name\\\":\\\"ranjith\\\",\\\"age\\\":20,\\\"gender\\\":\\\"M\\\",\\\"dob\\\":\\\"1994-08-19\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"vki\\\"}]"}
